application

Class MainMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.MainMenuController

  • public class MainMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main menu controller for Project, allows opening different scenes based on activity.
    Author:
    Craig Li, Prerak Patel

      • makeNewStage

        void makeNewStage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Opens a new stage/scene based on the button pressed.
        Parameters:
        event - event of pressing a button, used to determine which window is opened.

      • setStageParams

        private javafx.stage.Stage setStageParams(java.lang.String fxID,
                                          javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Sets Stage window title and fxml file for switching from main menu.
        Parameters:
        fxID - String containing fxID of button pressed on main menu
        stage - stage object to be modified.
        Returns:
        stage the stage to be generated

        Gets the current Order established in the main menu

      • setCurrentOrder

        public static void setCurrentOrder(Order order)
        Sets the current order in the main menu. (used when adding to store orders)
        Parameters:
        order - the order to set to be the current order.
